feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -10.3°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -14.2°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. A few local snow squalls early this evening. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. A few snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 10 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
